My first three Monsters have reached the end of their life span,and thus I am plaaning on freezing them for combination purposes.

Here are my three monsters that reached their limit:
Piroro(Piroro/Piroro)
Power:309
Intelligence:284
Speed:299
Accuracy:463
Defence:276
Life:386

Paper Dragon(Dragon/???)

Intelligence:517
Speed:292
Accuracy:426
Defense:317
Life:284

Power:457
Intelligence:336
Speed:266
Accuracy:246
Defense:369
Life:635

And here are my badges:
Care Badge(I have 2)
Leaf Badge(I have 2)
Light Badge(I have 2)
Fairy Badge(I have 1)

So,wich two monsters should I combine with what badge?

By Salokin on Saturday, August 25, 2007 - 12:53 pm:

If two monsters have high stats in a certain stat like a Dragon
with 999 Pow and 999 acc shouldn't be combinded with a Pixie
with 999 Int and Lif. If they both have high stats in the same one
than they come out with a HUGE advantage in those one or
two stats.

By Jake on Saturday, August 25, 2007 - 02:19 pm:

My Paper Dragon Has a Power stat of 566,and My Lessieorca has a Power stat of 457.But yet again,my Piroro has a Accuracy stat of 463 and my Paper Dragon has a Accuracy stat of 426.But wait,my Paper Dragon has a Defense of 276 while my orcaLessie has a defense stat of 369!Oh dear,so many choices.I think I'm going to combine my Papaer Dragon and OrcaLessie,I thinked that will make the best results.I'll try out the results and let you know.
